summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding a mortgage application related to a client named Vickers. Various individuals from Fifth Third Mortgage discuss the need for tax returns and other documentation to proceed with the loan approval process, indicating a timeline for closing the loan shortly after Thanksgiving.

persons.name: Jo-Ann Z. Brown
persons.context: Jo-Ann Z. Brown is involved in the mortgage application process and is coordinating with other team members to ensure all necessary documents are collected.

persons.name: Edward Cabrera
persons.context: Edward Cabrera is requesting documentation related to the mortgage application and is involved in the approval process.

persons.name: Stacie Hitchens
persons.context: Stacie Hitchens is responsible for sending the necessary tax returns for the mortgage application and is part of the communication chain regarding the loan.

persons.name: Laura Hoff
persons.context: Laura Hoff is included in the email correspondence regarding the mortgage application but her specific role is not detailed.

persons.name: Philip Fintchre II
persons.context: Philip Fintchre II is copied on the email correspondence but his specific role is not detailed.

connections.description: Jo-Ann Z. Brown and Edward Cabrera work together at Fifth Third Mortgage, collaborating on the mortgage application process.
Jo-Ann Z. Brown and Stacie Hitchens are both part of the Fifth Third Mortgage team, working on the same mortgage application.
Edward Cabrera and Stacie Hitchens are involved in the mortgage application process at Fifth Third Mortgage.

events.title: Mortgage Application Correspondence
events.description: Email exchanges regarding the Vickers mortgage application, discussing the need for tax returns and the timeline for closing the loan.

locations: 2501 Blue Ridge Rd. Suite 100, Raleigh, NC
keyFacts: The document consists of email correspondence regarding a mortgage application for a client named Vickers.
Jo-Ann Z. Brown is coordinating the collection of necessary documents for the loan approval process.
Edward Cabrera is requesting documentation and is involved in the approval process.
Stacie Hitchens is responsible for sending tax returns related to the mortgage application.
The team hopes to close the loan shortly after Thanksgiving.
